ingredients.ingredient: salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch dried oregano, or to taste

cookingTips: Crush garlic by pressing it flat under the knife blade to release maximum flavor
Melt butter slowly over medium heat to create a silky sauce without browning
Drizzle warm garlic butter sauce over salmon just before serving for best presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach the cook to master a classic garlic butter sauce that enhances the salmon without overwhelming its delicate flavor.
